attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: FUEL PRICES HAVE RISEN DRASTICALLY OVER THE PAST 7 YEARS AND HAS NOW REACHED OVER £1 A LITRE WHICH IS JUST RIDICULOUS WHEN OTHER COUNTRIES PAY FAR LESS IT HAS TO STOP NOW IT IS TIME TO SAY NO ENOUGH IS ENOUGH WE MUST STAND TOGETHER
